name: One-Button Charge Runner
description:
A minimalist one-button running game prototype.

Source code: https://bitbucket.org/mhoj/one-button_game/src/master/

How to play：

Press and release the spacebar to jump.

Long press to charge, makes you jump powerfully and get more score.

Avoid obstacles and get a high score!

By: Hang Dong, Yuan Li
